text: Paul Dominique Laxalt (August 2, 1922 - August 6, 2018) was a conservative politician from the United States. He represented Nevada in the United States Senate. Laxalt also served as Nevada's governor. He ran for President in 1988 against George H. W. Bush for the Republican Party presidential primary. However, he did not win. Laxalt was born in Reno, Nevada. His grandson is Adam Laxalt, who is the Republican nominee for Governor of Nevada. Laxalt died on August 6, 2018, at a health care facility in McLean, Virginia from complications of a fall, aged 96. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:United States senators from Nevada Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Nevada Category:Writers from Nevada Category:Politicians from Reno, Nevada Category:1988 United States presidential candidates Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:1922 births Category:2018 deaths
title: Paul Laxalt
